[User Question]
Using RANK: Get top 5 PO_HEADER_IDs with the highest total QUANTITY.
SELECT po_header_id, total_qty FROM ( SELECT po_header_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_qty, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC) AS rank FROM rcv_transactions GROUP BY po_header_id ) WHERE rank <= 5

[User Question]
Retrieve the average billed amount per supplier using GROUP BY.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, AVG(pod.amount_billed) AS avg_billed FROM po_distributions_all pod JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pod.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and PO numbers where shipments used more than 2 different packing slips using CTE and HAVING.*/

WITH packing_cte AS ( SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT rsh.packing_slip) AS unique_packing_slips FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 ) SELECT * FROM packing_cte WHERE unique_packing_slips > 2

You are a Text-to-SQL generator for Oracle EBS.

[User Question]
Find fully paid invoices

SELECT 
    ai.INVOICE_NUM,
    ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
    ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
    ai.AMOUNT_PAID,
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,
    hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME
FROM 
    ap_invoices_all ai
    JOIN ap_suppliers s 
        ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
      LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all ss 
        ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID
     LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou 
        ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    payment_status_flag = 'Y'

Retrieve the top 5 suppliers by the count of PO distributions with an amount ordered above 50000.*/

[User Question]
give me top 10 vendors for AS54888, show total purchased value

SELECT *
  FROM (
           SELECT v.vendor_name,
                  SUM (
                     CASE
                        WHEN l.line_type_id = 1
                             AND d.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY'
                        THEN l.unit_price * NVL(h.rate, 1) * d.quantity_ordered
                        ELSE NVL(h.rate, 1) * d.amount_ordered
                     END
                  ) AS total_purchased_value
             FROM po_headers_all h
                  JOIN po_lines_all l ON h.po_header_id = l.po_header_id
                  JOIN po_distributions_all d ON l.po_line_id = d.po_line_id
                  JOIN ap_suppliers v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id
                  JOIN mtl_system_items_b m ON l.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
                                            AND d.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id
            WHERE m.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%'
               OR m.description LIKE '%AS54888%'
         GROUP BY v.vendor_name
         ORDER BY total_purchased_value DESC
       )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

[User Question]
Find POs and supplier names where total return to supplier transactions > 200 units using GROUP BY and HAVING.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, SUM(rct.quantity) AS total_return_qty FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER' GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING SUM(rct.quantity) > 200

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE in ('PREPAYMENT')

[User Question]
List items and their corresponding PO numbers where the unit price is above 500.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, pla.unit_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pla.unit_price > 500

get receipt details against po number abc123

SELECT rsh.receipt_num, rct.transaction_id, rct.transaction_type, rct.transaction_date, rct.quantity, rsl.item_id, rsl.item_description, rsl.unit_of_measure, pha.segment1 AS po_number, hou.name AS operating_unit_name, ood.organization_name AS inventory_organization_name FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON rct.shipment_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON rct.shipment_line_id = rsl.shipment_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN org_organization_definitions ood ON rct.organization_id = ood.organization_id JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON ood.operating_unit = hou.organization_id WHERE pha.segment1 LIKE 'ABC%123%'

Find vendors with highest total AWT (withholding tax) across all invoices */

[User Question]
give me top 10 vendors for AS54888, show total purchased value

SELECT *
  FROM (
           SELECT v.vendor_name,
                  SUM (
                     CASE
                        WHEN l.line_type_id = 1
                             AND d.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY'
                        THEN l.unit_price * NVL(h.rate, 1) * d.quantity_ordered
                        ELSE NVL(h.rate, 1) * d.amount_ordered
                     END
                  ) AS total_purchased_value
             FROM po_headers_all h
                  JOIN po_lines_all l ON h.po_header_id = l.po_header_id
                  JOIN po_distributions_all d ON l.po_line_id = d.po_line_id
                  JOIN ap_suppliers v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id
                  JOIN mtl_system_items_b m ON l.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
                                            AND d.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id
            WHERE m.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%'
               OR m.description LIKE '%AS54888%'
         GROUP BY v.vendor_name
         ORDER BY total_purchased_value DESC
       )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

Find the latest PO and item revision per supplier.*/

[User Question]
to get opening balance at the start period and  period movement  for the period range and closing balance at the end of period across range of period say mar 08 to sep 08

WITH OpeningBalance AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08'  /*Only take opening balance from first period*/ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ), PeriodMovements AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS total_debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS total_credit FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Sep-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ) SELECT pm.account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, pm.account) AS account_desc, NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance,  /* Opening balance from Mar-08 only*/ NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) AS debit,  /*Total period debits from Mar-08 to Sep-08*/ NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS credit,  /* Total period credits from Mar-08 to Sep-08*/ NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) + NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) - NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS closing_balance  /*Correct closing balance calculation*/ FROM PeriodMovements pm LEFT JOIN OpeningBalance ob ON pm.account = ob.account JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON led.LEDGER_ID = 1 ORDER BY pm.account

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and POs where transactions had more than 5 different destination types using HAVING.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) AS dest_types FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) > 5

[User Question]
Retrieve items and POs where the same item appears more than once in different POs.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, COUNT(DISTINCT pha.segment1) AS po_count FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pha.segment1) > 1

[User Question]
List PO numbers and item codes where the total received quantity exceeds the ordered quantity.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(rct.quantity) AS total_received, pla.quantity AS ordered_quantity FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description), pla.quantity HAVING SUM(rct.quantity) > pla.quantity

[User Question]
Find top 5 items by total PO amount (unit price  quantity).*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(pla.unit_price * pla.quantity) AS total_value FROM po_lines_all pla LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) ORDER BY total_value DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: GOVERNMENT */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'GOVERNMENT'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
List all items ordered more than 500 units with their respective suppliers.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, aps.vendor_name, pla.quantity FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pla.quantity > 500

[User Question]
List PO numbers and item codes where exchange rate on purchse order is not same as receving.or when receipt cases where there is exchange rate variance*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        pda.po_distribution_id,        rct.transaction_id,pha.currency_code,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1) AS receipt_exchangerate,        NVL(pha.rate, 1) AS po_exchange_rate,        round(SUM(            CASE                WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN                     rct.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1)                WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN                     -1 * rct.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1)                ELSE 0            END        ),0) AS exchange_rate_variance FROM rcv_transactions rct      JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id      JOIN po_headers_all pha          ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id      JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id      JOIN po_distributions_all pda          ON rct.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id      LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id         AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.transaction_type IN ('RECEIVE', 'RETURN TO VENDOR')   AND rct.currency_conversion_rate <> pha.rate GROUP BY pha.segment1,          pda.po_distribution_id,pha.currency_code,          rct.transaction_id,          NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description),          NVL(rct.currency_conversion_rate, 1),          NVL(pha.rate, 1)

how to get chart of account structure of a given ledger as each account will have multiple segments

WITH QualifierData AS ( SELECT fifs.id_flex_num AS chart_of_accounts_id, fifs.ID_FLEX_STRUCTURE_CODE AS chart_of_accounts_name, SAV.APPLICATION_COLUMN_NAME, fifs.id_flex_code, fifs.application_id, fics.segment_num, fics.segment_name, fics.flex_value_set_id, fvs.flex_value_set_name, GLL.LEDGER_ID, SAV.SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE, COUNT(CASE WHEN SAV.SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE != 'GL_GLOBAL' THEN 1 END) OVER (PARTITION BY fifs.id_flex_num, fics.segment_num) AS NonGlobalCount  /* Count of non-GL_GLOBAL qualifiers*/ FROM fnd_id_flex_structures fifs JOIN fnd_id_flex_segments fics ON fifs.id_flex_num = fics.id_flex_num JOIN fnd_flex_value_sets fvs ON fics.flex_value_set_id = fvs.flex_value_set_id JOIN fnd_segment_attribute_values sav ON fifs.application_id = sav.application_id AND SAV.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE = 'Y' AND fifs.id_flex_code = sav.id_flex_code AND fics.application_column_name = sav.application_column_name AND fics.id_flex_num = sav.id_flex_num AND fics.id_flex_code = sav.id_flex_code JOIN gl_ledgers gll ON fifs.id_flex_num = gll.chart_of_accounts_id WHERE fifs.id_flex_code = 'GL#'  /* Only General Ledger COA */ AND fifs.application_id = 101  /* Application ID filter */ AND gll.ledger_id = 1 ) SELECT * FROM QualifierData WHERE /* Keep only GL_GLOBAL if no other qualifiers exist*/ NOT (SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE = 'GL_GLOBAL' AND NonGlobalCount > 0) ORDER BY chart_of_accounts_id, segment_num

[User Question]
give me supplier invoice aging in buckets of 60,60,90 and above

SELECT aps.vendor_name,
         COUNT (ai.invoice_id) AS total_invoices,
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 0 AND 30
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "0-30 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 31 AND 60
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "31-60 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 61 AND 90
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "61-90 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) > 90
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "91+ Days",
         SUM (ass.amount_remaining) AS total_outstanding
    FROM ap_invoices_all ai
         JOIN ap_suppliers aps
            ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
         JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all ass
            ON ai.invoice_id = ass.invoice_id
         LEFT JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip
            ON     ass.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id
               AND ass.payment_num = aip.payment_num
   WHERE     ai.cancelled_date IS NULL
         AND ass.amount_remaining > 0
         AND (aip.creation_date IS NULL OR aip.creation_date > CURRENT_DATE)
GROUP BY aps.vendor_name
ORDER BY total_outstanding DESC

[User Question]
List PO numbers and items where the quantity ordered does not match quantity received.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        plla.quantity AS qty_ordered,        plla.quantity_received AS qty_received FROM po_headers_all pha      JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id      JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id      LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id         AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE plla.quantity_received <> plla.quantity

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers and supplier names where the latest ASN status is 'CLOSED', using subquery and RANK.*/

SELECT po_number, vendor_name, asn_status FROM ( SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, rsh.asn_status, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY pha.po_header_id ORDER BY rsh.creation_date DESC) AS rn FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id ) WHERE rn = 1 AND asn_status = 'CLOSED'

[User Question]
calculate the % share of each ledgers chart_of_accounts_id within its ledger_category_code.

WITH total_coa AS (SELECT ledger_category_code, SUM(chart_of_accounts_id) AS total_coa FROM gl_ledgers GROUP BY ledger_category_code) SELECT g.ledger_id, g.ledger_category_code, g.chart_of_accounts_id, ROUND((g.chart_of_accounts_id / t.total_coa) * 100, 2) AS percentage_share FROM gl_ledgers g JOIN total_coa t ON g.ledger_category_code = t.ledger_category_code

[User Question]
Retrieve POs and items where the destination type is 'INVENTORY' and quantity received is greater than 200.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        SUM(rsl.quantity_received) AS total_received FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla     ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod     ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl     ON pla.po_line_id = rsl.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi     ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id    AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY' GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) HAVING SUM(rsl.quantity_received) > 200

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers, item codes, and supplier names where at least 3 different destinations were used per PO using CTE and HAVING.*/

WITH destinations_cte AS ( SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) AS destination_count FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name ) SELECT * FROM destinations_cte WHERE destination_count >= 3

[User Question]
get inventory organizations,operating units and  segment1 which is po number (purchse order number),item details etc for jan07

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date, pha.authorization_status, pla.item_description, pla.quantity, hou.name AS operating_unit_name, ood.organization_name AS inventory_organization_name FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON pla.org_id = hou.organization_id JOIN org_organization_definitions ood ON plla.ship_to_organization_id = ood.organization_id WHERE pha.creation_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JAN-2007', 'DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('31-JAN-2007', 'DD-MON-YYYY')

[User Question]
Get POs and items where the tranaction quantity is between 100 and 500 units.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, rct.quantity FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pla.po_line_id = rct.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and total PO value where PO was created in the last quarter and invoice status is 'APPROVED'.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, SUM(pla.unit_price * pla.quantity) AS total_value FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id WHERE pha.creation_date >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Q'), -3) AND rsh.invoice_status_code = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
get net movment of any account in a single period say Mar-08

WITH OpeningBalance AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08'  /*Only take opening balance from first period*/ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ), PeriodMovements AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS total_debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS total_credit FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ) SELECT pm.account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, pm.account) AS account_desc, NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance,  /* Opening balance from Mar-08 only */ NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) AS debit,  /* Total period debits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS credit,  /* Total period credits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) + NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) - NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS closing_balance /*Correct closing balance calculation*/ FROM PeriodMovements pm LEFT JOIN OpeningBalance ob ON pm.account = ob.account JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON led.LEDGER_ID = 1 ORDER BY pm.account

[User Question]
Count the number of unique items ordered by each vendor in the last year.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description)) AS unique_item_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pha.creation_date >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
List item codes, PO numbers, and total amount (unit price  quantity) for POs in last 90 days using 5 tables.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, SUM(pla.unit_price * pla.quantity) AS total_value FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pha.creation_date >= SYSDATE - 90 GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description), pha.segment1

give me details of purchaes order 4682 the items purchase, qty ,unit rate and item code, warehouse name etc.,

SELECT aps.vendor_name, ph.segment1 AS po_number, ph.creation_date AS po_creation_date,org.organization_name warehouse_name, NVL (msi.segment1, pl.item_description) AS item_code, SUM (pll.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty, pl.unit_price, SUM (pll.quantity * pl.unit_price) AS total_line_amount FROM po_headers_all ph JOIN po_lines_all pl ON ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all pll ON pl.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON     pl.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND pll.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ph.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id join org_organization_definitions org on org.organization_id = pll.ship_to_organization_id WHERE ph.segment1 = '4683' AND ph.authorization_status = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, ph.segment1, ph.creation_date, NVL (msi.segment1, pl.item_description), pl.unit_price, pl.po_line_id, org.organization_name

[User Question]
TO GET THE LIST OF ACCOUNTS OF A GIVEN TYPE SAY EXPENSE FOR MARCH 08FOLLOWING THE IS QUERY

SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) AS account_desc, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS credit, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE and gcc.account_type = 'E' GROUP BY gcc.segment3, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) ORDER BY account

List PO numbers and total amount ordered for suppliers in a specific vendor site code*/

[User Question]
get trial balances of multiple ledgers when leger short names are provided

WITH trial_balance AS ( SELECT LED.ledger_id, /* Using ledger_id for pivot */ LED.short_name AS ledger_short_name, TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS period, GCC.segment3 AS account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(LED.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, GCC.segment3) AS account_desc, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances BAL JOIN gl_code_combinations GCC ON BAL.code_combination_id = GCC.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS LED ON BAL.LEDGER_ID = LED.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS GP ON BAL.PERIOD_NAME = GP.PERIOD_NAME AND GP.period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND GP.period_type = LED.accounted_period_type WHERE LED.chart_of_accounts_id = 101 /* Replace with your COA ID */ AND LED.period_set_name = 'Accounting' /*Replace with your Period Set Name*/ AND LED.accounted_period_type = 'Month' /*Replace with your Period Type*/ AND GP.PERIOD_NAME = 'Jan-05' /*Replace with your required period*/ AND BAL.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND BAL.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND BAL.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND BAL.CURRENCY_CODE = LED.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY LED.ledger_id, LED.short_name, TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), GCC.segment3, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(LED.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, GCC.segment3) ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT account, account_desc, ledger_short_name, closing_balance FROM trial_balance ) PIVOT ( MAX(closing_balance) FOR ledger_short_name IN ( 'Vision Operations-' AS "Ledger A Closing", 'Vision BR SL (USD)-' AS "Ledger B Closing", 'Vision IFRS/IAS Ops-' AS "Ledger C Closing" ) ) ORDER BY account

[User Question]
List all items that have been returned to supplier along with PO and supplier details.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        aps.vendor_name,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        rct.quantity AS returned_quantity FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_headers_all pha     ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps     ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi     ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id    AND rct.organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER'

[User Question]
Find invoices where the cleared payment amount exceeded invoice amount (overpayments) under Vision Operations */

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, SUM(aca.AMOUNT) AS CLEARED_TOTAL FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT HAVING SUM(aca.AMOUNT) > ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD' AND ai.GL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JUN-2007','DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('30-JUN-2007','DD-MON-YYYY') AND hou.NAME = 'Vision Operations'

[User Question]
get item wise purchases from purchase order not necessarily received Calculate total purchase for item AS54888

SELECT 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END AS item_segment1,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END AS item_description,
    SUM (
        pl.unit_price
        * COALESCE(h.rate, 1)
        * COALESCE(pd.quantity_ordered, 0)
    ) AS total_purchase
FROM po_distributions_all pd
JOIN po_lines_all pl ON pl.po_line_id = pd.po_line_id
JOIN po_headers_all h ON pl.po_header_id = h.po_header_id AND h.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'
LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b m ON pd.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id
                                AND pl.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
WHERE 
    pl.item_description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%'
GROUP BY 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END
ORDER BY total_purchase DESC

[User Question]
Retrieve the average PO unit price per supplier and item category using 6 tables and GROUP BY.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,          NVL (msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,          cat.segment1 AS category,          AVG (pla.unit_price) AS avg_price     FROM po_lines_all pla          JOIN po_headers_all pha             ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id          JOIN po_line_locations_all plla             ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id          LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi             ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id                AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id          JOIN ap_suppliers aps             ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id          LEFT JOIN mtl_item_categories mic             ON msi.inventory_item_id = mic.category_id             and mic.category_set_id = 27             join mtl_categories cat on mic.category_id = cat.category_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name,          NVL (msi.segment1, pla.item_description),          cat.segment1

[User Question]
to get the balance at the end of a given single period period in the ledger currency for any account (segment3)

WITH OpeningBalance AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08'  /*Only take opening balance from first period*/ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ), PeriodMovements AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS total_debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS total_credit FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND gcc.account_type = 'E' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3 ) SELECT pm.account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, pm.account) AS account_desc, NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance,  /* Opening balance from Mar-08 only */ NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) AS debit,  /* Total period debits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS credit,  /* Total period credits from Mar-08 to Mar-08 */ NVL(ob.opening_balance, 0) + NVL(pm.total_debit, 0) - NVL(pm.total_credit, 0) AS closing_balance  /* Correct closing balance calculation */ FROM PeriodMovements pm LEFT JOIN OpeningBalance ob ON pm.account = ob.account JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON led.LEDGER_ID = 1 ORDER BY pm.account

[User Question]
item lying in receiving location  by return to receivng without return to supplier for long time over 2 months

WITH return_to_receiving AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtr_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtr_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), return_to_vendor AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtv_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtv_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), returns_combined AS ( SELECT rtr.po_distribution_id, rtr.shipment_line_id, rtr.rtr_qty, rtr.last_rtr_date, NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) AS rtv_qty, rtv.last_rtv_date FROM return_to_receiving rtr LEFT JOIN return_to_vendor rtv ON rtr.po_distribution_id = rtv.po_distribution_id AND rtr.shipment_line_id = rtv.shipment_line_id WHERE NVL(rtr.rtr_qty, 0) - NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) > 0 ) SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date AS po_date, pla.line_num AS po_line_number, pla.item_id, msi.segment1 AS item_code, msi.description AS item_description, pda.distribution_num, rc.rtr_qty AS qty_returned_to_receiving, rc.rtv_qty AS qty_returned_to_vendor, rc.last_rtr_date, rc.last_rtv_date, (NVL(rc.last_rtv_date, SYSDATE) - rc.last_rtr_date) AS days_since_return_to_receiving FROM po_distributions_all pda JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pda.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = pda.destination_organization_id JOIN returns_combined rc ON rc.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num

[User Question]
Find PO numbers and supplier names where total quantity returned exceeds total quantity received using SUM.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, SUM(CASE WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER' THEN rct.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS total_returned, SUM(CASE WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS total_received FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER' THEN rct.quantity ELSE 0 END) > SUM(CASE WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity ELSE 0 END)

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and POs where PO distributions are linked to more than 3 different budget accounts.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT pod.budget_account_id) AS budget_accounts FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON pha.po_header_id = pod.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pod.budget_account_id) > 3

[User Question]
PO Receipt Delays by Vendor with Custom Threshold (30 Days)

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT pha.segment1) AS delayed_pos, AVG(rt.transaction_date - pll.promised_date) AS avg_days_delayed, SUM(pla.quantity) AS total_ordered_quantity, SUM(rt.quantity) AS total_received_quantity FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all pll ON pla.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON pll.line_location_id = rt.po_line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y' AND (rt.transaction_date - pll.promised_date) > 30 GROUP BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY avg_days_delayed DESC

[User Question]
Top 5 Items by Total Purchased Amount in Q1 2007

SELECT 
    msi.segment1 AS item_code,
    msi.description AS item_description,
    SUM(pla.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(pha.rate, 1)) AS total_purchased_amount
FROM 
    po_headers_all pha
    JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id
    JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
WHERE 
    pha.approved_flag = 'Y'
    AND pha.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-03-31'
GROUP BY 
    msi.segment1,
    msi.description
ORDER BY 
    total_purchased_amount DESC
FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: TAX AUTHORITY */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'TAX AUTHORITY'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
List suppliers and POs where items were delivered with different UOMs than orderd uom*/

SELECT     aps.vendor_name,     pha.segment1 AS po_number,     rsh.shipment_num AS shipment_number,     pla.line_num AS po_line_number,     pla.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE AS po_uom,     rct.UNIT_OF_MEASURE AS receipt_uom,     rct.transaction_id,     rsh.receipt_num,     rct.quantity,     rct.transaction_date    FROM     po_headers_all pha     JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id     JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pla.po_line_id = rct.po_line_id     JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id     JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON rct.shipment_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id WHERE     pla.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE <> rct.UNIT_OF_MEASURE

POs with Quantity Received but Not Invoiced

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, msi.description AS item_description, msi.primary_uom_code AS base_uom, pla.quantity AS ordered_quantity, SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) AS received_qty_base_uom, SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) AS billed_qty_base_uom FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON pda.po_distribution_id = rt.po_distribution_id JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = rt.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_recv ON muc_recv.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_recv.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_recv.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_bill ON muc_bill.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_bill.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_bill.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y' GROUP BY pha.segment1, msi.description, msi.primary_uom_code, pla.quantity HAVING SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) > SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) ORDER BY pha.segment1

[User Question]
Retrieve items and their latest PO details where the subinventory is 'RAW_MATERIALS'.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, pla.unit_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND rct.organization_id= msi.organization_id WHERE pod.destination_subinventory = 'RAW_MATERIALS' AND pha.creation_date = (SELECT MAX(creation_date) FROM po_headers_all)

[User Question]
Provide backdated vendor balance by currency as of 31-Dec-2007 for vision operations */

WITH param AS (
    /* Define cutoff date and operating unit name centrally */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  payments_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Payments made after the cutoff date, restricted to the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.INVOICE_ID
),  prepay_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Prepayments (adjustments) made after the cutoff date, restricted to the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.INVOICE_ID
),  invoice_balances AS (
    /* Sum gross amounts from all payment schedules per invoice, restricted to the operating unit */
    SELECT
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID,
        SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT
    FROM
        ap_invoices_all ai
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID
)  SELECT
    /* Final vendor-level unpaid balances as of the cutoff date */
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF
FROM
    invoice_balances ib
    JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
    LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID
    LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID
GROUP BY
    s.VENDOR_NAME
HAVING
    /* Exclude fully paid invoices */
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) <> 0
ORDER BY
    UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF DESC

[User Question]
List suppliers, PO numbers, and total shipped quantities for items where at least 3 shipments exist using GROUP BY and HAVING.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, SUM(rsl.quantity_shipped) AS total_shipped FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON pla.po_line_id = rsl.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(rsl.shipment_line_id) >= 3

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date, pla.line_num, pla.item_description, pla.unit_meas_lookup_code, SUM(pla.quantity) AS transaction_quantity, pla.unit_price AS unit_rate, SUM(pla.quantity * pla.unit_price) AS line_amount, CASE WHEN pla.unit_meas_lookup_code = msi.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE THEN 1 ELSE muc.conversion_rate END AS conversion_rate, SUM(pla.quantity * CASE WHEN pla.unit_meas_lookup_code = msi.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE THEN 1 ELSE muc.conversion_rate END) AS primary_uom_quantity, msi.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE AS primary_unit_of_measure, msi.segment1 AS item_code FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON pla.unit_meas_lookup_code = muc.unit_of_measure AND pla.item_id = muc.inventory_item_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, pha.creation_date, pla.line_num, pla.item_description, pla.unit_meas_lookup_code, pla.unit_price, msi.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, muc.conversion_rate, msi.segment1

[User Question]
give me invoice wise aging as on 31-dec-2007 outsanding due dates */

WITH direct_payments AS (
    SELECT
        aip.invoice_id,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.gross_amount,
        SUM(NVL(aip.amount, 0)) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps 
            ON aip.invoice_id = aps.invoice_id
            AND aip.payment_num = aps.payment_num
    WHERE
        aip.accounting_date <= to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy')
    GROUP BY
        aip.invoice_id, aps.due_date, aps.payment_num, aps.gross_amount
),
prepayment_applied AS (
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        SUM(NVL(amount, 0)) AS prepay_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all
    WHERE
        line_type_lookup_code = 'PREPAY'
        AND accounting_date <= to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy')
    GROUP BY
        invoice_id
),
payment_schedule_ordered AS (
    SELECT
        aps.invoice_id,
        ai.invoice_num,
        ai.invoice_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.gross_amount,
        NVL(dp.paid_amount, 0) AS paid_amount,
        NVL(pap.prepay_amount, 0) AS prepay_amount,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.invoice_id ORDER BY aps.due_date) AS rn
    FROM
        ap_payment_schedules_all aps
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aps.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        LEFT JOIN direct_payments dp ON aps.invoice_id = dp.invoice_id AND aps.payment_num = dp.payment_num
        LEFT JOIN prepayment_applied pap ON aps.invoice_id = pap.invoice_id
),
allocated_schedules (
    invoice_id,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    rn
) AS (
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        invoice_num,
        invoice_date,
        payment_num,
        due_date,
        gross_amount,
        paid_amount,
        prepay_amount,
        0 AS prepay_applied,
        gross_amount - paid_amount AS remaining_amount,
        due_date - to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy') AS age,
        rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered
    WHERE rn = 1      UNION ALL      SELECT
        ps.invoice_id,
        ps.invoice_num,
        ps.invoice_date,
        ps.payment_num,
        ps.due_date,
        ps.gross_amount,
        ps.paid_amount,
        ps.prepay_amount,
        CASE
            WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
            ELSE
                0
        END AS prepay_applied,
        ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount - 
            CASE
                WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                    LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
                ELSE
                    0
            END AS remaining_amount,
        ps.due_date - to_date('31-dec-2007','dd-mon-yyyy') AS age,
        ps.rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered ps
    JOIN allocated_schedules prev 
        ON ps.invoice_id = prev.invoice_id AND ps.rn = prev.rn + 1
)
SELECT
    invoice_num,
    invoice_id,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age
FROM allocated_schedules
WHERE remaining_amount <> 0
ORDER BY invoice_num, due_date

[User Question]
Top 5 Items by Total Purchased Amount in Q1 2007

SELECT 
    msi.segment1 AS item_code,
    msi.description AS item_description,
    SUM(pla.quantity * pla.unit_price * NVL(pha.rate, 1)) AS total_purchased_amount
FROM 
    po_headers_all pha
    JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id
    JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
WHERE 
    pha.approved_flag = 'Y'
    AND pha.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-03-31'
GROUP BY 
    msi.segment1,
    msi.description
ORDER BY 
    total_purchased_amount DESC
FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Identify invoices with the highest number of partial payments under Vision Operations */

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, COUNT(aip.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID) AS PARTIAL_COUNT FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT > (SELECT SUM(aip2.AMOUNT) FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aip2 WHERE aip2.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID) AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY ai.INVOICE_NUM ORDER BY PARTIAL_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
List all items with their respective PO and supplier where ASN status is 'CLOSED'.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsh.asn_status = 'CLOSED'

Retrieve PO numbers, item codes, and conversion rates where conversion rate is greater than 1.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, muc.conversion_rate FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON msi.inventory_item_id = muc.inventory_item_id WHERE muc.conversion_rate > 1

[User Question]
List POs and their items where the ASN type is 'ASN' and more than 3 containers were shipped.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, rsh.num_of_containers FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsh.asn_type = 'ASN' AND rsh.num_of_containers > 3

Find count of invoices by ledger with validated distributions */

[User Question]
Find vendors with the highest number of distinct invoices paid via EFT in Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT ai.INVOICE_ID) AS EFT_INVOICE_COUNT FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aca.PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE = 'EFT' AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME ORDER BY EFT_INVOICE_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Retrieve supplier names and total billed amounts for POs created in the last year.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, SUM(pod.amount_billed) AS total_billed FROM po_distributions_all pod JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pod.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pha.creation_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

List suppliers and their total PO count where destination type is 'INVENTORY' and PO unit price is above 1000.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,        COUNT(DISTINCT pha.po_header_id) AS po_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla     ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod     ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps     ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY'   AND pla.unit_price > 1000 GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Retrieve POs and suppliers where the same shipment had more than 2 different destination types using HAVING.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) AS dest_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) > 2

Get the top 10 PO shipments by total transfer + transportation cost using CTE and ORDER BY.*/

WITH shipment_totals AS ( SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, SUM(rsl.transfer_cost + rsl.transportation_cost) AS total_cost FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON rsl.shipment_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rsh.shipment_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name ) SELECT * FROM shipment_totals ORDER BY total_cost DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

List suppliers with their most recent PO and ASN status using a CTE.*/

WITH Latest_PO AS ( SELECT pha.po_header_id, MAX(pha.creation_date) AS latest_date FROM po_headers_all pha GROUP BY pha.po_header_id ) SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsh.asn_status FROM Latest_PO lp JOIN po_headers_all pha ON lp.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id

[User Question]
Find unpaid invoices

SELECT 
    ai.INVOICE_NUM,
    ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
    ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
    ai.AMOUNT_PAID,
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,
    hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME
FROM 
    ap_invoices_all ai
    JOIN ap_suppliers s 
        ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
      LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all ss 
        ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID
     LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou 
        ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    payment_status_flag = 'N'

[User Question]
Give the purchase order details covering po header information like po number (segment1), creation_date( po_date) vendor name vendor site code, item code, item description,qty,unit_rate,  need by date, promise date  PO Headers to Lines, Line Locations, Distributions with full supplier and item context, current quantities received, billed etc for last one month

SELECT ph.segment1 AS po_number,
       ph.creation_date AS po_date,ph.currency_code po_currency,
       aps.vendor_name,
       apsa.vendor_site_code,
       pl.line_num,
       pl.item_id,
       pl.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE transaction_uom,
       pl.quantity qty_tran_uom,
       pl.item_description purchase_line_description,
       msi.segment1 AS item_code,
       msi.description AS item_description,
       msi.primary_uom_code,
       pll.line_location_id,
           pll.QUANTITY as "loc_qty_order_todate",
      pll.QUANTITY_RECEIVED  as"loc_qty_rec_todate",
     pll.QUANTITY_CANCELLED as "loc_qty_cancel_todate",
     pll.QUANTITY_BILLED as "loc_qty_billed_todate",
     pll.NEED_BY_DATE  ,
      pll.PROMISED_DATE,
       pd.po_distribution_id,
       pd.quantity_ordered,
       hou.name AS operating_unit,
       pd.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID,
pd.CODE_COMBINATION_ID,
pd.QUANTITY_ORDERED dist_qty_order,
pd.QUANTITY_DELIVERED dist_qty_deliver_todate,
pd.QUANTITY_BILLED dis_qty_billed_todate,
pd.QUANTITY_CANCELLED dist_cancel_todate,
pd.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID ,
pd.AMOUNT_BILLED,
pd.DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE,
pd.DESTINATION_ORGANIZATION_ID,
pd.DESTINATION_SUBINVENTORY,
pd.distribution_num,
pd.distribution_type,
       ood.organization_code AS inventory_org_code,
       gl.name AS ledger_name
  FROM po_headers_all ph
       JOIN po_lines_all pl
          ON ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id
       JOIN po_line_locations_all pll
          ON pl.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id
       JOIN po_distributions_all pd
          ON pll.line_location_id = pd.line_location_id
       LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps
          ON ph.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
       LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all apsa
          ON ph.vendor_site_id = apsa.vendor_site_id
       LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi
          ON     pl.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
             AND pd.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou
          ON ph.org_id = hou.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN org_organization_definitions ood
          ON pd.destination_organization_id = ood.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN gl_ledgers gl
          ON hou.set_of_books_id = gl.ledger_id
          where ph.creation_date > sysdate-30

Find invoices under 'Vision Operations' with total distribution amount mismatch */

[User Question]
Provide backdated vendor balance by currency as of 31-Dec-2007 for vision operations */

WITH param AS (
    /* Define cutoff date and operating unit name centrally */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  payments_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Payments made after the cutoff date, restricted to the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.INVOICE_ID
),  prepay_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Prepayments (adjustments) made after the cutoff date, restricted to the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.INVOICE_ID
),  invoice_balances AS (
    /* Sum gross amounts from all payment schedules per invoice, restricted to the operating unit */
    SELECT
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID,
        SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT
    FROM
        ap_invoices_all ai
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.VENDOR_ID
)  SELECT
    /* Final vendor-level unpaid balances as of the cutoff date */
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF
FROM
    invoice_balances ib
    JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
    LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID
    LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID
GROUP BY
    s.VENDOR_NAME
HAVING
    /* Exclude fully paid invoices */
    SUM(
        ib.GROSS_AMOUNT
        - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0)
        - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)
    ) <> 0
ORDER BY
    UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF DESC
FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY

Retrieve items and PO numbers where the unit of measure matches the primary UOM.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsl.unit_of_measure, msi.primary_uom FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON pla.po_line_id = rsl.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsl.unit_of_measure = msi.PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE

Calculate total days early or late for payments per vendor in Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, SUM(aip.CREATION_DATE - aps.DUE_DATE) AS TOTAL_DAYS_DIFF FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aps.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME

[User Question]
Purchase Orders with Receipts Beyond Promised date by More Than 30 Days or never received.

WITH min_receipt_dates AS (
    SELECT
        rt.po_distribution_id,
        MIN(rt.transaction_date) AS min_rcv_date
    FROM
        rcv_transactions rt
    WHERE
        rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE'
    GROUP BY
        rt.po_distribution_id
)

SELECT
    pha.segment1 AS po_number,
    pha.creation_date AS po_creation_date,
    aps.vendor_name,
    pha.currency_code,
    pha.rate,
    pla.line_num,
    pla.item_id,
    pla.item_description,
    pla.quantity AS ordered_quantity,
    pla.unit_price,
    pda.quantity_ordered AS dist_quantity_ordered,
    pda.quantity_delivered AS dist_quantity_delivered,
    pda.quantity_billed AS dist_quantity_billed,
    pll.promised_date,
    round(pll.need_by_date),
    round(mrd.min_rcv_date),
   round( CASE 
        WHEN pll.promised_date IS NOT NULL THEN 
            (NVL(mrd.min_rcv_date, SYSDATE) - pll.promised_date)
        ELSE
            (NVL(mrd.min_rcv_date, SYSDATE) - pll.need_by_date)
    END) AS days_late
FROM
    po_headers_all pha
    JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id
    JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id
    JOIN po_line_locations_all pll ON pll.line_location_id = pda.line_location_id
    LEFT JOIN min_receipt_dates mrd ON pda.po_distribution_id = mrd.po_distribution_id
    LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
WHERE
    (
        (pll.promised_date IS NOT NULL AND (
            (mrd.min_rcv_date IS NOT NULL AND mrd.min_rcv_date > pll.promised_date + 30)
            OR
            (mrd.min_rcv_date IS NULL AND SYSDATE > pll.promised_date + 30)
        ))
        OR
        (pll.promised_date IS NULL AND (
            (mrd.min_rcv_date IS NOT NULL AND mrd.min_rcv_date > pll.need_by_date + 30)
            OR
            (mrd.min_rcv_date IS NULL AND SYSDATE > pll.need_by_date + 30)
        ))
    )
ORDER BY
    pha.segment1,
    pla.line_num,
    pda.distribution_num

[User Question]
List PO numbers, item codes, and comments for transactions with non-null comments.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, rct.comments FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.comments IS NOT NULL

[User Question]
List all POs created between two dates along with item codes and supplier names.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        pha.creation_date,        aps.vendor_name,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi     ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id     AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pha.creation_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')                           AND TO_DATE('2024-03-31','YYYY-MM-DD')

GET THE LIST OF CORRECTED TRANACTIONS IN PO RECIVING  */

SELECT APS.VENDOR_NAME,MSI.SEGMENT1 ITEM_CODE,PLA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, PHA.SEGMENT1 PO_NUMBER,PDA.DISTRIBUTION_NUM,PLA.LINE_NUM,RCT.PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID,    rct.transaction_id, rct.po_line_id, rct.quantity, rct.transaction_date,RCT.UNIT_OF_MEASURE,SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID,SHIPMENT_LINE_ID -- add only the needed rct columns FROM po_headers_all pha    JOIN (select vendor_id,vendor_name from ap_suppliers) aps   ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id    JOIN po_distributions_all pda   ON pha.po_header_id = pda.po_header_id JOIN rcv_transactions rct    ON rct.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id           AND rct.transaction_type = 'CORRECT' JOIN po_lines_all pla   ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id             LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi   ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id  AND rct.organization_id = msi.organization_id

Identify suppliers with high mix of currencies (more than 3 currencies) under Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT aca.CURRENCY_CODE) > 3

[User Question]
Retrieve items and their PO numbers where shipment unit price is greater than 1000 and less than 5000.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsl.shipment_unit_price FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsl.shipment_unit_price > 1000 AND rsl.shipment_unit_price < 5000

[User Question]
Get suppliers and the number of receipt transactions they had last quarter.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(rct.transaction_id) AS receipt_count FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_date BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'Q') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Q') GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Find POs where the same supplier used more than 2 different vendor site IDs across shipments.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT rsh.vendor_site_id) AS site_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rsh.vendor_site_id) > 2

[User Question]
Month-Wise PO Approval Delays in 2008

SELECT TO_CHAR (pha.creation_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS approval_month,
         COUNT (pha.po_header_id) AS total_pos,
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (nvl(pha.approved_date,trunc(sysdate)) - pha.creation_date) > 5 THEN 1
               ELSE 0
            END)
            AS delayed_approvals,
         ROUND (AVG (nvl(pha.approved_date,trunc(sysdate)) - pha.creation_date), 2)
            AS avg_approval_days
    FROM po_headers_all pha
   WHERE     pha.approved_flag = 'Y'
         AND pha.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2008-01-01' AND DATE '2008-12-31'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR (pha.creation_date, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY approval_month

[User Question]
get the list of oustanding invoices as on 31 dec 2007 for vision operations backdate

WITH cutoff_param AS ( /* Define the cutoff date and operating unit name as parameters */ SELECT TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date, 'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name FROM dual ),  payments_after_cutoff AS ( /* Payments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT aip.INVOICE_ID, SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aip JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY aip.INVOICE_ID ),  prepay_after_cutoff AS ( /* Prepayment adjustments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT aid.INVOICE_ID, SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all aid JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY' AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY aid.INVOICE_ID ),  invoice_balances AS ( /*Total invoice balances (sum of gross_amount across all payment schedules per invoice) restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, ai.VENDOR_ID, SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, ai.VENDOR_ID )  SELECT /*Final result: unpaid balances per invoice as of the cutoff date */ s.VENDOR_NAME, ib.INVOICE_ID, ib.INVOICE_NUM, ib.INVOICE_DATE, ib.GROSS_AMOUNT, NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) AS payment_after_cutoff, NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0) AS prepay_after_cutoff, (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF FROM invoice_balances ib JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID WHERE /*Exclude invoices where unpaid balance is fully cleared */ (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) <> 0 ORDER BY UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF

[User Question]
GIVE ME THE PAYMENT DETAILS FOR INVOICE NUMBER CRAC Apr 06 09

SELECT aip.INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID,
         aip.payment_num,
         aip.CREATION_date,
         aip.amount,
         aca.currency_code,
         aca.exchange_rate,
         aca.exchange_rate_type,
         aca.payment_method_code,
         aip.check_id,
         aca.check_number,
         aca.check_date,
         aca.bank_account_id,
         aca.PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE,
         aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE,
         aca.creation_date,
         aca.last_update_date,
         aca.created_by,
         aca.last_updated_by
    FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aip
         JOIN ap_checks_all aca
            ON aip.check_id = aca.check_id
         JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps
            ON aip.invoice_id = aps.invoice_id
            and aip.payment_num= aps.payment_num
            join ap_invoices_all ai on aps.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
   WHERE ai.invoice_num = 'CRAC Apr 06 09'
ORDER BY aip.CREATION_date

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and POs where PO distributions are linked to more than 3 different budget accounts.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT pod.budget_account_id) AS budget_accounts FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON pha.po_header_id = pod.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pod.budget_account_id) > 3
