[User Question]
Find total invoice amounts and unpaid balances per ledger */

SELECT g.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, SUM(i.INVOICE_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, SUM(i.INVOICE_AMOUNT - NVL(i.AMOUNT_PAID, 0)) AS TOTAL_UNPAID FROM ap_invoices_all i JOIN gl_ledgers g ON i.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = g.LEDGER_ID GROUP BY g.NAME

[User Question]
POs with Quantity Received but Not Invoiced

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, msi.description AS item_description, msi.primary_uom_code AS base_uom, pla.quantity AS ordered_quantity, SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) AS received_qty_base_uom, SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) AS billed_qty_base_uom FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON pda.po_distribution_id = rt.po_distribution_id JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = rt.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_recv ON muc_recv.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_recv.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_recv.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc_bill ON muc_bill.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND muc_bill.uom_code = rt.uom_code AND muc_bill.unit_of_measure = msi.primary_uom_code WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y' GROUP BY pha.segment1, msi.description, msi.primary_uom_code, pla.quantity HAVING SUM(rt.quantity * COALESCE(muc_recv.conversion_rate, 1)) > SUM(COALESCE(pda.quantity_billed, 0) * COALESCE(muc_bill.conversion_rate, 1)) ORDER BY pha.segment1

[User Question]
give me the list of invoices, where time taken to final approve invoice is more than  x days say 10 days

WITH approval_data AS ( SELECT ai.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, aps.vendor_name, ah.iteration, ah.response, ah.creation_date AS response_date, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id) AS rn_first, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id DESC) AS rn_last FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN ap_inv_aprvl_hist_all ah ON ai.invoice_id = ah.invoice_id WHERE 1=1 ), submission_dates AS ( SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MIN(response_date) AS submitted_date FROM approval_data WHERE response NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration ), approval_dates AS ( SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MAX(response_date) AS approved_date FROM approval_data WHERE response IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration ), latest_iterations AS ( SELECT invoice_id, MAX(iteration) AS latest_iteration FROM approval_data GROUP BY invoice_id ), final_data AS ( SELECT s.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, aps.vendor_name, s.iteration, s.submitted_date, a.approved_date, CASE WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN a.approved_date - s.submitted_date ELSE CURRENT_DATE - s.submitted_date END AS days_taken, CASE WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN 'Approved' ELSE 'Pending or Withdrawn' END AS approval_status, l.latest_iteration FROM submission_dates s LEFT JOIN approval_dates a ON s.invoice_id = a.invoice_id AND s.iteration = a.iteration JOIN latest_iterations l ON s.invoice_id = l.invoice_id JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id ) SELECT invoice_num, invoice_date, vendor_name, iteration, invoice_id, submitted_date, approved_date, days_taken, approval_status FROM final_data WHERE ( approved_date IS NOT NULL AND days_taken > 0 ) OR ( approved_date IS NULL AND iteration = latest_iteration AND days_taken > 10 ) ORDER BY submitted_date DESC

[User Question]
List payments made in foreign currency for Vision Operations */

SELECT      ai.INVOICE_NUM AS "INVOICE_NUM",     aca.CURRENCY_CODE AS "PAYMENT_CURRENCY",     gl.CURRENCY_CODE AS "ACCOUNTING_CURRENCY",     aca.AMOUNT AS "PAYMENT_AMOUNT",     aca.CHECK_NUMBER AS "CHECK_NUMBER",     aca.CHECK_DATE AS "CHECK_DATE",     s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME" FROM      ap_invoices_all ai     JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID     JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID     JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID     JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID     JOIN gl_ledgers gl ON h.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID WHERE      aca.CURRENCY_CODE <> gl.CURRENCY_CODE     AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'

Find invoices under ledger 'Vision US Ledger' and terms 'Net 30' with validated distributions */

SELECT i.INVOICE_NUM, g.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, t.NAME AS TERMS_NAME FROM ap_invoices_all i JOIN gl_ledgers g ON i.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = g.LEDGER_ID JOIN ap_terms t ON i.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID WHERE g.NAME = 'Vision US Ledger' AND t.NAME = 'Net 30' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all d WHERE d.INVOICE_ID = i.INVOICE_ID AND NVL(d.MATCH_STATUS_FLAG, 'N') = 'N')

Get top vendors by total invoice amount under 'Vision Operations'

WITH vendor_totals AS (SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, SUM(a.INVOICE_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ap_invoices_all a JOIN hr_operating_units h ON a.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN ap_suppliers s ON a.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME) SELECT VENDOR_NAME, TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM vendor_totals WHERE TOTAL_AMOUNT > 10000

[User Question]
Generate remittance advice for large checks (amount > $50,000) with all invoice details */

SELECT aca.CHECK_NUMBER, aca.CHECK_DATE, aca.AMOUNT AS CHECK_AMOUNT, s.VENDOR_NAME, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, aps.DUE_DATE, aip.AMOUNT AS PAYMENT_AMOUNT, aip.PAYMENT_NUM, aip.CREATION_DATE AS PAYMENT_DATE FROM ap_checks_all aca JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aca.CHECK_ID = aip.CHECK_ID JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID AND aip.PAYMENT_NUM = aps.PAYMENT_NUM JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID WHERE aca.AMOUNT > 50000 ORDER BY aca.CHECK_NUMBER, s.VENDOR_NAME

[User Question]
Find POs and items where the UOM conversion rate is greater than 2.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, muc.conversion_rate FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON msi.inventory_item_id = muc.inventory_item_id WHERE muc.conversion_rate > 2

[User Question]
Retrieve the latest 5 PO receipts per supplier using ROW_NUMBER and subquery.*/

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsh.receipt_num, rsh.creation_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY rsh.creation_date DESC) AS rn FROM rcv_shipment_headers rsh JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rsh.shipment_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id ) WHERE rn <= 5
